title: HARD ROCKERS DEADENDS FREE ALBUM SAMPLER [Whole album]
description:
_____________________________________________

DEADENDS - PULLING THE PUNCHES!
_____________________________________________


THE TORRENT:
------------------
This .torrent is perfectly legal, and posted in understanding between the band and Honeymilk Records. All material is copyrighted and can only be distributed in the form of this .torrent file
It is released to benefit from the strong community sharing music and recommendations.

Thanks for downloading and sharing this .torrent file. 
By letting anyone listen and share the album at sample quality, Deadends and Honeymilk hope that they can limit the  amount of illegal shares, and at the same time give the music lovers a possibility to check out the album from home without spending money or time on it.

Files includes low bitrate mp3s, coverart and this readme-file. The torrent can not be alterted or reposted in any way without a written agreement with Honeymilk Records.

The album is released april 28. 2008 in Norway, and Deadends are stoked and ready for touring again. If you share this file well enough, they might even come to a venue near you.


THE QUALITY:
------------------
Yes, we know. This is a sample torrent. If its good enough for you, its yours. If its not, then you might be happy to hear that Honeymilk sells losless, DRM-free FLAC files of the album for instant downloading. If you decide to share and download better quality files of the album, you are a thief and an arse, and the subjct of many a Deadends-lyric.

Deadends and Honeymilk believes that Filesharers should aknowledge the artists right to choose the platform for their music, and wether they should sign with a label or not. If you disagree in the path we choose, you should not listen to it but rather stand up for the artists that you think do, buy their music, and help THEM up and forth!

Also, if you need more proof as to the quality of the record, you can stream it and, buy it and tip your friends about it at 

www.deadends.us/ecard
